rationale:
**Why this is right**
Placeholder rationale for OTR Practice Test 4 - Q031. Selected option A pending LLM review.

**Why the others miss**
This section will explain distractors after the generator step is wired.

> Options
- A. Type of adaptive equipment and level of caregiver assistance needed when the child is in the bathroom
- B. Objective improvements in balance, strength, and ROM that contribute to the child's progress with toileting
- C. Frequency and duration of scheduled OT sessions with the child that focus on toileting training
- D. O000000OOO000H 0000000000000. b>)
